mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_NO, P.TITLE, P.CREATION_DATE, U.USERS_ID, U.USERS_NAME, U.EMAIL FROM POST P JOIN USERS U ON P.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID
SELECT U.USERS_ID, U.USERS_NAME, U.EMAIL, J.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME FROM USERS U JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID JOIN JOB_CODE J ON J.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE
